title: It all makes sense... the Blue Essence changes...
body:
Bear with me one moment.

Battlefront 2 was released this month, and widely seen as a release disaster because of massive paywalls. Battlefront 2 was developed by EA. EA... lEAgue of Legends... pay to play characters... it all makes sense! League of Legends blue essence changes were an underhanded way to psychologically frustrate the player base into buying RP to get champions, and it backfired in the same way as Battlefront.

Lesson for the companies is that if you build a wall to sell rope, most people will just go around or leave instead of paying for the rope. Don't intentionally infuriate your fanbase.
